name: Mini Crossword Genius
description:
Mini Crossword Genius is a new word puzzle by Pup Interactive! Unscramble pairs of words to solve the mini crosswords. You're given just a handful of hint letters, and then its up to you to drag the letters into the right spots to solve the puzzle. Are you up to the challenge?

Play 120 themed levels, or select a difficulty and play infinite mode in this web version. For more levels, check out our app Mini Crossword Genius on iOS and android app stores.
